title: Import IP addresses from SyS to OVHcloud
step1Description: To start importing an IP, you will need to know the key (token) generated by the manager of the server currently associated with the IP address you want to migrate.
step2CompatibilitySuccessMessage: The {{ serverName }} server is compatible with {{ ip }}
step2UnavailableMigrationMessage: Importing the {{ ip }} IP address is not supported by the {{ serverName }} server. Please contact our support team for more information.
step5ConfirmTextPart1: Click ‘{{ confirmButtonLabel }}’ to confirm your order.
step5ConfirmTextPart2: A new tab will open, and you will be automatically redirected to the payment interface.
step5SuccessMessage: The migration request (order {{ orderId }}) has been processed.
